languages.text: "Слаженная работа, хорошее оснащение, шифрованные сигнатуры... Это не просто какое-то пустотное отребье — это координированная атака профессионалов. Наемники, Лорд-капитан".
"Well coordinated, well equipped, signatures encrypted... Those weren't some nameless void rabble — they were professionals. Mercenaries, Lord Cap'n."
languages.original_text: "Слаженная работа, хорошее оснащение, шифрованные сигнатуры... Это не просто какое-то пустотное отребье — это координированная атака профессионалов. Наемники, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "Well coordinated, well equipped, signatures encrypted... Those weren't some nameless void rabble — they were professionals. Mercenaries, Lord Cap'n."
"Well coordinated, well equipped, signatures encrypted... Those weren't some nameless void rabble — they were professionals. Mercenaries, Lord Cap'n."

"Well coordinated, well equipped, signatures encrypted... Those weren't some nameless void rabble — they were professionals. Mercenaries, Lord Cap'n."
"Well coordinated, well equipped, signatures encrypted... Those weren't some nameless void rabble — they were professionals. Mercenaries, Lord Cap'n."

languages.text: «Bien coordinados, bien equipados, señales encriptadas... No eran basura del vacío cualquiera, sino profesionales. Mercenarios, Lord Capi».
languages.original_text: "Well coordinated, well equipped, signatures encrypted... Those weren't some nameless void rabble — they were professionals. Mercenaries, Lord Cap'n."

traits.locale_text: «Bien coordinados, bien equipados, señales encriptadas... No eran basura del vacío cualquiera, sino profesionales. Mercenarios, Lord Capi».

languages.text: “协调出色，装备精良，签名也被加密过……他们可不是什么随处可见的杂碎。他们是专业人士，应该是雇佣兵，船长老大。”
languages.original_text: "Well coordinated, well equipped, signatures encrypted... Those weren't some nameless void rabble — they were professionals. Mercenaries, Lord Cap'n."

traits.locale_text: “协调出色，装备精良，签名也被加密过……他们可不是什么随处可见的杂碎。他们是专业人士，应该是雇佣兵，船长老大。”

languages.text: 「十分訓練され、武装し、署名が暗号化されています…これは、名もなきヴォイドの暴徒の一部ではありませんでした。ロード・キャプテン、彼らはプロの傭兵だったのです」
languages.original_text: "Well coordinated, well equipped, signatures encrypted... Those weren't some nameless void rabble — they were professionals. Mercenaries, Lord Cap'n."

traits.locale_text: 「十分訓練され、武装し、署名が暗号化されています…これは、名もなきヴォイドの暴徒の一部ではありませんでした。ロード・キャプテン、彼らはプロの傭兵だったのです」

languages.text: "Gut koordiniert, bestens ausgerüstet, verschlüsselte Signaturen ... Das waren nicht irgendwelche Leerenschurken ... das waren Profis. Söldner, Lord Cap'n."
languages.original_text: "Well coordinated, well equipped, signatures encrypted... Those weren't some nameless void rabble — they were professionals. Mercenaries, Lord Cap'n."

traits.locale_text: "Gut koordiniert, bestens ausgerüstet, verschlüsselte Signaturen ... Das waren nicht irgendwelche Leerenschurken ... das waren Profis. Söldner, Lord Cap'n."

languages.text: « Une bande organisée et bien équipée, dotée de signatures cryptées... Rien à voir avec la racaille qui écume d'ordinaire la galaxie. Je tablerais plutôt sur des professionnels. Très probablement des mercenaires, {mf|seigneur-cap'taine|seigneure-cap'taine}. »
languages.original_text: "Well coordinated, well equipped, signatures encrypted... Those weren't some nameless void rabble — they were professionals. Mercenaries, Lord Cap'n."

traits.locale_text: « Une bande organisée et bien équipée, dotée de signatures cryptées... Rien à voir avec la racaille qui écume d'ordinaire la galaxie. Je tablerais plutôt sur des professionnels. Très probablement des mercenaires, {mf|seigneur-cap'taine|seigneure-cap'taine}. »

languages.text: "İyi koordineli, iyi donanımlı, imzaları şifreli... Bunlar sıradan uçsuz ayaktakımı değil, profesyoneller. Paralı askerler Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "Well coordinated, well equipped, signatures encrypted... Those weren't some nameless void rabble — they were professionals. Mercenaries, Lord Cap'n."

traits.locale_text: "İyi koordineli, iyi donanımlı, imzaları şifreli... Bunlar sıradan uçsuz ayaktakımı değil, profesyoneller. Paralı askerler Lord Kaptan."
